label: NE-NAS-PD01Z
description: PIR Motion Sensor and Light Measurement

paramInformation.label: ON / OFF Duration
paramInformation.description: How long should the associated devices have ON status.

paramInformation.label: PIR Detection ENABLED / DISABLED
paramInformation.description: Enable og disable the PIR sensor

paramInformation.label: Ambent Illumination LUX Level
paramInformation.description: Lux value which determines when the light sensor is activated

paramInformation.label: Re-Trigger Interval
paramInformation.description: Adjust the interval of being re-triggered

paramInformation.label: Light Sensor Polling Interval
paramInformation.description: How often should ambient illumination be evaluated

paramInformation.label: Ambient Illumination Report
paramInformation.description: when lux changes by the number in this setting it is reported
